data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Litoral to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Litoral, Equatorial Guinea
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Litoral, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.section_summary: On average, 91 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Litoral, Equatorial Guinea.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 253,621 people in the state of Litoral who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Litoral, Equatorial Guinea, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Cocobeach
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Cocobeach, Litoral, Equatorial Guinea.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Litoral, Equatorial Guinea into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Litoral, Equatorial Guinea to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Litoral, Equatorial Guinea who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.
